quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"borderline"字面直译（边界线的）或"personality disorder"不准确翻译（个性障碍），将术语误解为"边界线人格障碍"或"边缘性个性障碍"
quiz_item.sentence: People with **borderline personality disorder** often experience intense mood swings, a deep fear of abandonment, and difficulty maintaining stable relationships—common symptoms of this mental health condition.
